Regulation Name(s): Cocaine and cocaine metabolite test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for DRI Cocaine Metabolite Assay, an enzyme immunoassay for qualitative and semi-quantitative detection of benzoylecgonine in urine.
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative and/or semi-quantitative determination of benzoylecgonine (cocaine metabolite) in human urine at cutoff concentrations of 150 ng/mL or 300 ng/mL; results are for preliminary screening and require confirmation by more specific methods such as LC-MS/MS.
